All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
 
Book
Represents a book in library management system
BookConstants
This class holds constant values related to books in the library management system.
BookDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling Book-related database operations.
BookService
This class provides services related to book management, such as adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting books.
BookValidator
This class provides Validations for all Book data.
Borrow
Represents a borrowing transaction in a library system.
BorrowConstants
This class holds constant values related to borrowing books in the library management system.
BorrowDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling Borrow-related database operations.
BorrowService
This class provides services related to borrowing and returning books.
BorrowValidator
This class provides Validations for all Borrow data.
ConnectionUtil
A utility class for managing database connections.
DAOException
This exception class is used to handle errors related to Data Access Object (DAO) operations.
DatabaseConnectionException
This exception class is used to handle errors related to database connection.
PasswordUtil
Utility class for hashing and checking passwords using BCrypt.
ResultSetUtils
Utility class for building model objects from ResultSet data.
ServiceException
This exception class is used to handle errors related to service layer operations.
User
Represents a user in the library management system.
UserConstants
This class holds constant values related to users in the library management system.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling User-related database operations.
UserService
This class provides services related to user management, such as register, login, list, update, and delete.
UserValidator
This class provides Validations for all User data.
ValidationException
This exception class is used to handle validation errors related to validation layer operations.
